Text: First things first: Thanks for sharing! I've burned with Nero and tried to play in my ordinary DVDplayer. AllI hear is white noise. I must have missed something, can anyone hint me?
You need a DTS decoder (or DVDplayer with one) to play it.

I have the a similar prpoblem as vuxen......and yes I have a DTS decoder. It sounds like white noise and almost like an MP3 that needs to be uncooked. It's an awful shame, I was really looking forward to hearing this!!!
Is this a DVD-A rip?  If so isn't it a bit small?
